Text.content: Global categories must be managed via the explorer by adding/deleting/modifying the category folders under /system/categories/. For (sub-)site specific categories, the sitemap editor should be used. For all users with the role Category editor the Categories view is availabe in the sitemap editor.

Image.Title: The categories view in the sitemap editor

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
The sitemap editor's categories view allows to edit local categories, i.e., the ones that are located in the currently opened (sub-)sitemap. Global categories, i.e., the ones defined system wide or in parent (sub-)sitemaps, are just displayed.

Editing a category means to edit Title and folder name.
